    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IQueryBeanResult<PolicyPeriod> getAllPolicyPeriods()
      Gets all policies associated with this producer code, including closed policies, and those with which this producer code is no longer currently related.
      IQueryBeanResult<PolicyPeriod> getCurrentlyRelatedPolicyPeriods()
      Gets policies to which this producer code is currently related.
      IQueryBeanResult<PolicyPeriod> getOpenCurrentlyRelatedPolicyPeriods()
      Gets open policies to which this producer code is currently related.
      IQueryBeanResult<PolicyPeriod> getOpenPolicyPeriods()
      Gets open policies associated with this producer code, including those with which this producer code is no longer currently related.
      IQueryBeanResult<PolicyCommission> getPolicyCommissions()
      Gets the policy producer codes linked to this producer code
      MonetaryAmount getTotalCommissionExpense() 
      MonetaryAmount getTotalCommissionPayable() 
      void writeoffCommissionRecovery(MonetaryAmount amountToWriteoff)
      Writes off commission recovery by giving the producer a bonus of the specified amount, and then pulling negative payable balances from the ProducerCode and its children PolicyCommissions and ChargeCommissions to match the bonus.

    • Method Detail

      • getPolicyCommissions

        IQueryBeanResult<PolicyCommission> getPolicyCommissions()
        Gets the policy producer codes linked to this producer code
        Returns:
        Gets the policy producer codes linked to this producer code

      • getTotalCommissionPayable

        MonetaryAmount getTotalCommissionPayable()
        Returns:
        Gets the total commission payable for all policies on which this producer code participates. Includes commission payable directly to the producer code.

      • getTotalCommissionExpense

        MonetaryAmount getTotalCommissionExpense()
        Returns:
        Gets the total commission expense for this producer. This is equal to the sum of the commission expenses on all of the producer's producer codes' policies.

      • getOpenCurrentlyRelatedPolicyPeriods

        IQueryBeanResult<PolicyPeriod> getOpenCurrentlyRelatedPolicyPeriods()
        Gets open policies to which this producer code is currently related.
        Returns:
        Open policies to which this producer code is currently related

      • getOpenPolicyPeriods

        IQueryBeanResult<PolicyPeriod> getOpenPolicyPeriods()
        Gets open policies associated with this producer code, including those with which this producer code is no longer currently related.
        Returns:
        Open policies associated with this producer code, including those with which this producer code is no longer currently related.

      • getCurrentlyRelatedPolicyPeriods

        IQueryBeanResult<PolicyPeriod> getCurrentlyRelatedPolicyPeriods()
        Gets policies to which this producer code is currently related. Includes closed policies.
        Returns:
        policies to which this producer code is currently related. Includes closed policies.

      • getAllPolicyPeriods

        IQueryBeanResult<PolicyPeriod> getAllPolicyPeriods()
        Gets all policies associated with this producer code, including closed policies, and those with which this producer code is no longer currently related.
        Returns:
        Returns all policies associated with this producer code, including closed policies, and those with which this producer code is no longer currently related.

      • writeoffCommissionRecovery

        void writeoffCommissionRecovery(MonetaryAmount amountToWriteoff)
        Writes off commission recovery by giving the producer a bonus of the specified amount, and then pulling negative payable balances from the ProducerCode and its children PolicyCommissions and ChargeCommissions to match the bonus.
        Parameters:
        amountToWriteoff - The amount to write off
